keyMappings:
# --- Unmap (keep on top) ---
unmap <a-m>
unmap <a-p>
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap ge
unmap gE
unmap zH
unmap zL
unmap >>
unmap <<
unmap gs
unmap <a-f>

# --- Colemak ---
mapkey n j
mapkey N J
mapkey e k
mapkey E K
mapkey i l
mapkey I L
mapkey k n
mapkey K N
mapkey l i
mapkey L I
mapkey j e
mapkey J E

# --- Quick browse ---
# Start with letter g means go to someplace
# eg: gy means go to youtube

map gm createTab https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/h/
map gM createTab https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/
map gv createTab https://portal.vamk.fi/my/
map gh createTab https://github.com/
map gH createTab https://github.com/andreehai1011
map gy createTab https://www.youtube.com
map gY createTab https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=WL
map gs createTab https://www.mankier.com/explain
map s Vomnibar.activate keyword=google
map S Vomnibar.activate keyword=man
map w Vomnibar.activate keyword=wiki

# --- Mapping here ---

# Lower-case letters are taken to be global marks and vice versa
map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode swap

# Navigate (key has been remapped so neio becomes hjkl)
map j scrollPageDown
map k scrollPageUp
map h scrollToLeft
map l scrollToRight
map d scrollFullPageDown
map u scrollFullPageUp
map K previousTab
map J nextTab

# Pass key: - back to normal, ; send next key, :send all keys
map : passNextKey count=999999
map ; passNextKey
map - passNextKey normal

# Close tabs (for redundancy, "Keyboard Shortcuts to Close" extension handle it)
map <a-x> closeOtherTabs
map <a-r> closeTabsOnRight
# map Dh closeTabsOnLeft

# Open links
map ' LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map gc LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

# Move tabs
map < moveTabLeft
map <a-,> moveTabLeft count=99
map > moveTabRight
map <a-.> moveTabRight count=99

map a Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map A Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map M toggleMuteTab
map , goPrevious
map . goNext
map q visitPreviousTab
searchEngines:
# Assigned to hotkeys
wiki: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
google: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google

# Maybe useful?
b: https://www.bing.com/search?setmkt=en-GB&q=%s Bing
e: https://www.ebay.com/sch/?_nkw=%s eBay
hn: https://www.hnsearch.com/search#request/submissions&q=%s&start=0 HackerNews
qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s&t=all Qwant search engine
trello: https://trello.com/search?q=%s Trello
wa: https://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%s Wolfram|Alpha
yh: https://search.yahoo.com/search?p=%s&ei=UTF-8 Yahoo

# Googles
cache: http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:%s Google cache
cs: javascript:location='http://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'%20+%20escape(location.hostname)%20+%20'%20%S'%20;%20void%200 Current site
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
m: https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#search/%s Gmail search
map: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
phrase: https://www.google.com/search?q=”%s” Google Phrase Search
store: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/search/%s Google Chrome Web Store
tr: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translator
year: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:y&q=%s Search in past year
month: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:m&q=%s Search in past month
week: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:w&q=%s Search in past week
day: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:d&q=%s Search in last 24 hours

# Shopping
a: https://www.amazon.com/s?k=%s Amazon
ade: https://www.amazon.de/s?k=%s Amazon
ali: https://www.aliexpress.com/wholesale?SearchText=%s Aliexpress
hi: https://hinta.fi/haku?q=%s Hinta.fi
hip: https://hintaopas.fi/search?search=%s Hintaopas prices search

archive: https://web.archive.org/web/*/%s Internet Archive
aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s Arch Linux Wiki

dict: http://dictionary.com/browse/%s Dictionary
epub: https://www.epub.vn/search#%s Epub.vn ebooks

hub: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub search
